extendedInfo.description: New year, new you! Dukan Diet Pro provides hundreds of dukan food recipes to help you lose weight and to keep it off. âââââââââââââââââââââââ"This is not just the best app I have ever come cross but this is the most comprehensive directory of amazing, interesting, fruitful, exciting dukan recipes I have ever come across. I would of paid 100 pounds for this had I know the contents before purchasing. I can tell LOADS of work has gone into this and you are sharing some amazing energy for little. Well well done. Thank you so much."- Michael Todd, Director of the UKH Gro"I love this app! So many recipes!"- Serge Gobachev "Lost two lbs in four days!"- Andrea Ward"Awesome dishes. Even my super picky boyfriend loves them!"- Aja Chism"I bought this app and it's amazing! Just reading the recipes is getting me hungry, yum. It's easy to follow and I'm gonna try one of the beef recipes for lunch. Thnx! I Love it :)"- Jasmine OganaâââââââââââââââââââââââThe only thing that matters when it comes to diet plans is if it works!Based on over 20 years of research the Dukan Diet is one of the most popular books and diet plans in France. It is a protein-based diet designed by French nutritionist and dietician, Pierre Dukan.The diet consists of 4 phases: attack, cruise, consolidation, and stabilization.The attack phase is designed to enable dieters to rapidly lose 2 to 3 kilograms (4.4 to 6.6 lb) in 2â7 days by kick-starting their metabolism. Dieters are allowed to eat as much as they want of 72 protein-rich foods.The cruise phase is designed to allow dieters to more gradually achieve the weight they aim for by eating protein-rich foods with the addition of 28 specific vegetables. The consolidation phase is designed to help in preventing any future massive weight gain. During this phase, fruit, bread, cheese and starchy foods are reintroduced into a normal diet, leaving two celebratory meals a week as directed by the plan.Finally, in the stabilization phase, dieters can essentially eat whatever they want without gaining weight by following a few lifestyle rules: protein day once a week, eating oat bran every day and making a fitness commitment to "take the stairs". Dieters should follow this last phase for the rest of their life to avoid regaining weight.â Features an elegant and intuitive interfaceâ Over 300 dukan food recipesâ Recipes for all meal types including: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snackâ Star your favorites for easy referenceâ Filter menu to sortâ Search feature to quickly find your favorite recipeDownload Dukan Diet Pro and start feeling healthier today!

reviews.title: now i don\'t have to surf the web!
reviews.author: Karen Booker

reviews.title: Happy with app
reviews.comment: Good app for meal ideas when you just cant face roast beef and bbq chicken anymore. Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly yummy...
reviews.comment: A few of the desserts don\'t work because the amounts are wrong (cheesecakes, mousses) and, unfortunately, however hard you work to make oat bran taste good, it\'s still vile, even in a chocolate cake! Recipes have given me some starting points to experiment with though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lots of room for improvement
reviews.comment: Many spelling errors and some products which I have no idea what they are.  i would prefer to get my money back until this product is worth its money. Right now I dont believe it is, not by a long shot!  Sadly disappointed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improving but good
reviews.comment: The pull down menu does not work you need to go through recipes one at a time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Simple interface, easy to use and has good recipes.
reviews.author: synthya getz

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: the comments and real pictures make a diference. very good.
